alert.note: Alert for Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Quay County; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 20 at 9:39PM MDT until May 21 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...North and northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected, except up to 55 mph from Raton Pass to Capulin. * WHERE...Quay County, Far Northeast Highlands, Harding County, Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass and Union County. * WHEN...Until 3 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust may drop the visibility below 1 mile at times in dust-prone locations.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Quay County; Union County
